name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Software Engineer specializing in Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM)
profile_summary:
Proficient Software Engineer specializing in Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM) with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications. Expert in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and cloud technologies such as **AWS**. Skilled in database solutions including **SQL** and **NoSQL**, and leveraging protocols like **OAuth**, **OpenID Connect**, and **SAML** for secure authentication.

Experienced in designing and implementing **REST APIs** and utilizing **JSON** for data interchange. Proficient in infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **AWS CloudFormation**, as well as container orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Strong problem-solving abilities, coupled with excellent communication skills, ensure clear collaboration across teams.

With hands-on expertise in compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, I have a solid background in deploying secure and compliant systems. Successfully built AI/ML-powered platforms to facilitate predictive analytics and automation, and have implemented microservices and CI/CD pipelines to enhance efficiency.

experience.role: Software Engineer specializing in Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM)
experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained robust **REST APIs** using **Node.js** and **TypeScript** for account lifecycle management, ensuring secure authentication and authorization with **OAuth**, **OpenID Connect**, and **SAML** protocols.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **AWS** cloud services, particularly using **AWS CloudFormation** and **Terraform**, streamlining infrastructure as code for efficient deployment practices.
Utilized **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, including PostgreSQL and MongoDB, to manage user data and access controls while implementing **RBAC**, **ABAC**, and **ReBAC** models to enforce permissions effectively.
Designed and executed testing strategies using **Cypress** and **Jest** to automate unit tests, facilitating continuous integration and deployment for **JavaScript** applications.
Engaged in problem-solving sessions to troubleshoot access management issues and enhance user experience while communicating changes effectively to stakeholders.
Implemented security measures, including **LDAP** integration and user provisioning workflows, to maintain compliance with industry standards and improve data protection across platforms.
Developed technical documentation and user guides for IAM integrations, ensuring clarity in communication and supporting onboarding efforts for new users.
Managed the deployment of containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, promoting a microservices architecture for scalability and fault tolerance in access management systems.
Monitored application performance and security incidents, leveraging insights to propose enhancements and improve overall system robustness.
Participated in agile ceremonies, providing input on feature development while ensuring timely delivery of key IAM solutions.

• Developed and maintained **REST APIs** in **Node.js** and **TypeScript**, ensuring secure access management aligned with **OAuth**, **OpenID Connect**, and **SAML** standards for over **100,000** user accounts.
• Implemented role-based access controls (RBAC) and attribute-based access controls (ABAC) to enhance security and compliance, successfully reducing unauthorized access incidents by **30%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams through effective **communication** to create smooth workflows and integrations for **AWS** services, increasing team efficiency by **25%**.
• Leveraged **AWS CloudFormation** and **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, optimizing deployment times by **40%** and minimizing configuration errors.
• Ensured data integrity and security across various storage solutions, implementing **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases strategies for access management data that processed **2M** records daily.
• Enhanced problem-solving capabilities by diagnosing and resolving access-related incidents with high problem resolution satisfaction rates of **95%**.
• Designed user lifecycle management features in line with **SCIM**, improving user onboarding processes by **50%** and reducing manual errors.
• Utilized **Kubernetes** to streamline CI/CD processes, enhancing productivity and deployment reliability for IAM solutions deployed on **AWS**.
• Conducted performance tuning and optimization of existing IAM systems, achieving response time improvements by over **20%**.
• Developed comprehensive documentation for systems and processes to foster transparency and assist in onboarding new team members effectively.

Developed and maintained robust **REST APIs** for Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM) utilizing **Node.js** to ensure seamless integration between user management systems and authentication protocols.
Engineered secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms using **OAuth 2.0**, **OpenID Connect**, and **SAML** to support multi-tenancy architectures and compliance with security standards.
Implemented scalable backend services on **AWS** leveraging **Terraform** and **AWS CloudFormation** to automate infrastructure provisioning for IAM resources, improving deployment speed by **30%**.
Designed and optimized data storage solutions using both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, enhancing data retrieval performance by **50%** through efficient querying strategies and schemas tailored for account management workflows.
Created user roles and permissions management using **RBAC**, enabling **strict** access control and privilege management to protect sensitive data across 100+ account configurations.
Utilized **Kubernetes** for container orchestration of IAM services, enabling consistent environments and reducing operational overhead by **40%**, while ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Developed comprehensive documentation for IAM services, engaging in **effective communication** with stakeholders to support successful feature rollouts, resulting in a **20%** increase in user satisfaction.
Implemented data serialization protocols including **JSON**, **XML**, and **SOAP**, ensuring interoperability with legacy systems while facilitating secure data exchange.
Collaborated on security audits and assessments in line with GDPR and other compliance requirements, applying **problem-solving** skills to identify and rectify potential vulnerabilities in access management.
Integrated identity federation with **LDAP** and **Active Directory**, streamlining access for **500+** users and improving authentication workflows across multiple platforms.
